trans-unit.source: Explains how to get the registration key used to register all StorSimple devices.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to get the registration key used to register all StorSimple devices.

trans-unit.source: To get the StorSimple service registration key
trans-unit.target: To get the StorSimple service registration key

trans-unit.source: On the **StorSimple Manager service** page, click the service that you created.
trans-unit.target: On the **StorSimple Manager service** page, click the service that you created.

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the **Quick Start** page.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the **Quick Start** page.

trans-unit.source: (You can click the quick start icon ![StorSimple Quick Start icon ](./media/storsimple-get-service-registration-key-gov/HCS_QuickStartIcon-include.png) to access the **Quick Start** page at any time.)
trans-unit.target: (You can click the quick start icon ![StorSimple Quick Start icon ](./media/storsimple-get-service-registration-key-gov/HCS_QuickStartIcon-include.png) to access the **Quick Start** page at any time.)

trans-unit.source: You can also click **Registration Key** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: You can also click **Registration Key** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: You will have to wait for a few minutes while the key is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: You will have to wait for a few minutes while the key is retrieved.

trans-unit.source: The **Service Registration Key** dialog box appears.
trans-unit.target: The **Service Registration Key** dialog box appears.

trans-unit.source: to copy the key and save it for later use.
trans-unit.target: to copy the key and save it for later use.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon ![StorSimple Check icon](./media/storsimple-get-service-registration-key-gov/HCS_CheckIcon-include.png) to close this dialog box and return to the **Quick Start** page.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon ![StorSimple Check icon](./media/storsimple-get-service-registration-key-gov/HCS_CheckIcon-include.png) to close this dialog box and return to the **Quick Start** page.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The service registration key is used to register all the devices that need to register with your StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The service registration key is used to register all the devices that need to register with your StorSimple Manager service.
